foreignData.name: Ifrit-Waffenmeister
foreignData.text:
Erstschlag
Wenn der Ifrit-Waffenmeister ins Spiel kommt oder aufgedeckt wird, erhält eine andere Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, +3/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Morph {2}{U}{R}{W} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)

foreignData.name: Maestro de armas efrit
foreignData.text:
Daña primero.
Cuando el Maestro de armas efrit entre al campo de batalla o se ponga boca arriba, otra criatura objetivo que controlas obtiene +3/+0 hasta el final del turno.
Metamorfosis {2}{U}{R}{W}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)

foreignData.name: Maître d'armes éfrit
foreignData.text:
Initiative
Quand le Maître d'armes éfrit arrive sur le champ de bataille ou qu'il est retourné face visible, une autre créature ciblée que vous contrôlez gagne +3/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Mue {2}{U}{R}{W} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)

foreignData.name: Efreet Maestro d'Armi
foreignData.text:
Attacco improvviso
Quando l'Efreet Maestro d'Armi entra nel campo di battaglia o viene girato a faccia in su, un'altra creatura bersaglio che controlli prende +3/+0 fino alla fine del turno.
Metamorfosi {2}{U}{R}{W} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)

foreignData.name: イフリートの武器熟練者
foreignData.text:
先制攻撃
イフリートの武器熟練者が戦場に出たか表向きになったとき、あなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋３/＋０の修整を受ける。
変異{2}{U}{R}{W}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — イフリート・モンク

foreignData.name: 이프리트 무기달인
foreignData.text:
선제공격
이프리트 무기달인이 전장에 들어오거나 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +3/+0을 받는다.
변이 {2}{U}{R}{W} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Efrite Mestre de Armas
foreignData.text:
Iniciativa
Quando Efrite Mestre de Armas entra no campo de batalha ou é voltado para cima, outra criatura alvo que você controla recebe +3/+0 até o final do turno.
Metamorfose {2}{U}{R}{W} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)

foreignData.name: Ифрит, Мастер Оружия
foreignData.text:
Первый удар
Когда Ифрит, Мастер Оружия выходит на поле битвы или переворачивается рубашкой вниз, другое целевое существо под вашим контролем получает +3/+0 до конца хода.
Оборотень {2}{U}{R}{W} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)

foreignData.name: 舞兵魔神
foreignData.text:
先攻
当舞兵魔神进战场或翻回正面时，另一个目标由你操控的生物得+3/+0直到回合结束。
变身{2}{U}{R}{W}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

foreignData.name: 舞兵魔神
foreignData.text:
先攻
當舞兵魔神進戰場或翻回正面時，另一個目標由你操控的生物得+3/+0直到回合結束。
變身{2}{U}{R}{W}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）

name: Efreet Weaponmaster
originalText:
First strike
When Efreet Weaponmaster enters the battlefield or is turned face up, another target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {2}{U}{R}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.
